item.title: [LeetCode] 122. Best Time to Buy and Sell Stock II
item.author: Debakar Roy
item.description: Best Time to Buy and Sell Stock II Link to original Problem on LeetCode Say you have an array for which the ith element is the price of a given stock on day i. Design an algorithm to find the maximum profit. You may complete as many transactions as you like (i.e., buy one and sell one share of the stock multiple times). Note: You may not engage in multiple transactions at the same time (i.
